location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Muscat to Barrow Helbert Ellis

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Captain George Atkinson at Muscat who is suffering from ill health and news of Syed Torkee [Turki bin Said]'s failed attack on Muscat.The letter also discusses Pelly's intentions of travelling to Shiraz and arrangements with regards to Dr Abraham Hojel's pay.The letter also mentions the need for a medical storekeeper in the region; the release of Persian captives from Bokhara by the Russians and an outbreak of plague at Hillah.
